thread.title: Playa Hotels & Resorts announces promotion of two executives
thread.title_full: Playa Hotels & Resorts announces promotion of two executives

author: eTN Editor
title: Playa Hotels & Resorts announces promotion of two executives
text:
Playa Hotels & Resorts announces promotion of two executives Adv: L-R: Doug Knapp & Howard Tanenbaum Adv: 
FT. LAUDERDALE, Florida - Kevin Froemming, Executive Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer, Playa Resorts Management, today announced the promotions of two of its executives. Both joined Playa as Global Directors in their respective fields in 2014 as Playa was in the process of launching the newly created Hyatt Zilara luxury all-inclusive resorts for adults, and Hyatt Ziva luxury all-inclusive resorts for guests of all ages.
